::CyberShark::

    "No, everything's fine. There's just a bug infestation of our ship. I 
gotta do some matenance so the cleaning systems will be back," CyberShark 
said, knowing he was lying.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Magmatron::

    "Mantella, I need you to help me in attacking a really huge ship," 
Magmatron said. "This ship is 1.5 times larger than the Nemisis, and just as 
powerful."
    He knew that she would be scared, he knew this because he was scared. "I 
know this is a lot to ask, but you will not be going in with just yourself, I 
will be there, and you will have a cloaking device and all the weaponry you 
need."
